Universal Cookie Checker

PROJECTS GOAL

This software was designed and structed to remove the limits and options of validating your cookie data from stealer logs. With this, came our main concept.

There's a lot of pieces that go into an effect like this. What follows is an outline of the animations and VFX concepts, all in pure css :)


Core Fundimentals:

  1. Make this compatible with every website, regardless of the request
  2. Provide a system with customizable features that will satisfy all users.
  3. Enhance with cutting edge technologies such as data spoofing to protect the privacy of users.
  4. Contains unique digital fingerprinted emulation and browser headers.
  5. Allow the use of several different emulated platforms

WHAT SETS US APART?

Unlike all the other checkers available to the public, ours has no restrictions on the data you can validate.
Unlocking the potential to gain access to higher security websites such as Paypal, Bank Logs, Cash App, Email Access, and other tricky and hard to manage sites.
And unlike all the other established, "In-place" software and their developers, we listen to our customers and take their requests seriously.
We designed and developed this software for our customers, so our high priority, is keeping you happy.




WORK MODE #1

WORKING WITH COOKIES

BASICS



  • 1.) Work Mode Status - Weither working with Full Stealer Log Folder, or Rather Cookie Data Individually.
  • 2.) Number of Threads - This is how quick the software will run, but for the speed you will comprimise computer load.. So the choice is yours.
  • 3.)The Path To The Matieral - Set your file directory path of the main log folder on your device.
  • 4.) Where to save valid? - You set your save path.
  • 5.)Enter The Resources Name - This will be your cookie URL inside of the browser.txt cookie data file.
  • 6.)Fingerprints - You can select from a variety of fingerprints such as Windows. Android. Mac. Or Even Set Your own Custom Fingerprints
  • 7.) (If applicable) - Set your Fingerprint Folder Directory Path.
  • 8.)Record a screen shot - If you choose - Upon Entry To Your Cookie Data, You Set This As You Please.


    BASIC SETTINGS




  • 1.)The type of Work - Weither its Emulation OR HTTP Request
  • 2.) The DIRECT Link to the Website
  • 3.) Element that is visible ONLY when valid - Meaning A Direct Link to /Account or /MySettings etc.
  • 4.) Search Method is Weither to Find a HTML Element or The Actual Text On That Page.
  • 5.) Selectable Time Duration to Work more Smoothly with Your Personal Device.
  • 6.) Parse Values? - Do You Want To Gather Any Records From That Log.
  • 7.) Send a Direct Link To The Deseird Request (Step 6.)
  • 8.) You Can Then Again, Set A Custom Wait Limit If Desired.
  • 9.) The Name or Element of The Desired Capture


    ADDITONAL

  • 2.)


    • SYSTEM FINGERPRINTS


  • 1.)
  • 2.)A dynamic JavaScript taint analysis framework to detect and prevent browser fingerprinting.
  • 3.)Canvas API, which is designed for drawing graphics via JS & HTML, Also used for online tracking via browser fingerprinting.
  • 4.)WebGL is a JavaScript API used to render 3D graphics within a web browser by utilizing the device's GPU. This makes it possible for websites to gather detailed information about a user's graphics card, which can be used to create a unique browser fingerprint.
  • 5.)Other tracking techniques they looked at include WebRTC IP, canvas fingerprinting, canvas font fingerprinting and battery API15.
  • 6.)Canvas fingerprinting works by exploiting the HTML5 canvas element: when a user visits a website, his browser is instructed to 'draw' a hidden line of text or other graphic.
  • 7.)Screen Width
  • 8.)Screen Hight
